item.title: By: walter
item.dc:creator: walter
item.description:
David was on the judging panel at Under-The-Radar in June. No - he didn't offer me wads of money but he was a really nice guy.
Walter
item.content:encoded:
David was on the judging panel at Under-The-Radar in June. No – he didn’t offer me wads of money but he was a really nice guy.

Walter

item.title: By: David Hornik
item.dc:creator: David Hornik
item.description: I'd love to come out to Ireland one of these days. There's lots of exciting stuff going on over there.
item.content:encoded: I’d love to come out to Ireland one of these days. There’s lots of exciting stuff going on over there.
